name: SPACE BEINGS
description:
SPACE BEINGS

Get 100 kills for the sake of the challenge. That's all that matters, after all.

Power your ship up by collecting different icons in the map. Be careful, power always comes at a cost.

Space Beings is my first project in GameMaker2. I did it closely following a tutorial that taught how to make Space Rocks. I added some new stuff not mentioned in it, like powerups and bounce mechanics. The true purpose of the project was to learn how to use the program, and I might continue uploading versions since I'll still use it for that purpose.
